document.full_text: italian automaker fiat spa  can boost its stake in chrysler group llc to more than 70 percent using an array of options, including buying the u.s. treasury's stake.
document.title: fiat can push chrysler stake to more than 70 percent
lines_and_colors: italian automaker fiat spa  can boost its stake in chrysler group llc to more than 70 percent using an array of options, including buying the u.s. treasury's stake.
